title: AMT: As an Intl Admin, I want to require Phone Number for Trainer/Agent
custom_preconds:
The Registration Team has request required phone number fields on AMT profiles to assist them in inviting players to IPL.

AC:

* In the Trainer/Agent section of prospect profiles, there will be a new Phone Number field 
* The field will be a simple text box that can accept numerical inputs
* The field will be required

title: AMT: As an Intl Admin, I want to require Phone Number for Players
custom_preconds:
The Registration Team has request required phone number fields on AMT profiles to assist them in inviting players to IPL.

AC:

* In the Country & ID section of prospect profiles, there will be a new Phone Number field 
* The field will be a simple text box that can accept numerical inputs
* The field will be required

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Non-First Year Add Cs to display contract year
custom_preconds:
Currently, Add Cs for non-first year UPCs show a specific rate for a specific calendar year.Â  

AC:

* In the salary chart on non-first year UPCs, replace the calendar year with the year of contract.
** For example, in the attached screenshot, â€œ2023" and "2024" should be removed and instead it would say "First Season Weekly Salary" and "Second Season Weekly Salary".

!image-20230817-191856.png|width=975,height=587!

title: Create View for MNC with Signing Bonus Foreiture Language
custom_preconds:
Context: The Signing Bonus Forfeiture Flag does not exist in the ebis DB as it was omitted when moving from ebis1 to ebis2.  The only way to determine if the Signing Bonus can be forfeit is by scanning the language of the contract.Â  Standard Language, there is a label where we can search on the word â€œRecoupmentâ€� and omit the â€œNo Recoupmentâ€� labels.Â  Custom Language would involve scanning the signing bonus clause clob field for the word â€œforfeitâ€�

From Conor:

â€œWould probably hope to have Flag = 1 reserved for 5 Year, 4-Year, and 3-Year versions of â€œRecoupment - Signing Bonus mUPC,â€� as well as, in rare cases, mentions of Custom Language (e.g., Liquidated Damages).â€�

AC:

* A new view will be created in ebis for Distinct Minor League contracts with a signing bonus with this language.
* [~accountid:557058:e7722893-ccb6-4708-83a1-252c868bee22] can provide additional support on what is needed

title: As a BOC Admin, I want an "Are You Sure?" message when sending bulletins
custom_preconds:
AC:

* When clicking Send Bulletin on the Transaction Bulletin, the system will prompt the user to confirm their action
* When clicking Send Result Bulletin on the Waivers screen, the system will prompt the user to confirm their action
* When clicking Send Request Bulletin on the Waivers screen, the system will prompt the user to confirm their action
* If the user confirms their action, the bulletin will be sent as expected
* If the user does not confirm their action, the modal will be dismissed and the bulletin will not be sent

title: As a BOC MNC Admin, I want clubs prevented from submitting terms on a Domestic MNC if the player is an Intl Ama
custom_preconds:
Context: If an intl ama player signs to a domestic affiliate, ebis will automatically convert the contract to a domestic mUPC.  Club users should be able to enter terms and save the contract, but not be able to actually submit terms.  A BOC Admin will need to submit the contract.

AC:

* When an a club user clicks Submit on an domestic mUPC for an international amateur player, the system will return a blocking message:
** Title: Warning
** Body: â€œPlease contact the BOC for approval to sign a First-Year International player to a domestic affiliate.â€�
** Buttons:  Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back

title: As a Intl Admin, I want to merge multiple unverified profiles at the same time
custom_preconds:
Context: When prospects are created in AMT, a profile is automatically created in EBIS.  Because of this, there are often several profile created for the same player.  Needing to merge all these profile one by one is very time consuming for the registration analysts.

AC:

* Users will be able to select multiple (more than 2) Unregistered international amateur profiles on the Reg Admin widget and click merge
* A modal will be displayed allowing the user to choose which profile should be the master and proceed with the merge
** All expected system updates will occur
* If a registered player is selected (any reg status other than Unregistered), the system will return a blocking message:
** Title: Error
** Body: You have selected a registered player.  Bulk merge may not be used with registered players.
** Buttons: Back

title: Import Log - Raise Character Limit for Uploaded Agent Info Files
custom_preconds:
In Import Log widget under the Agents & Agencies dashboard.

Increase the character limit to 75 for the uploaded Agent Info files in columns:

* Address1
* Organization

title: As an Intl Amatuer Admin, I want BOC Registered Players to be visible to all users
custom_preconds:
AC:

* Intl Amateur players, with a BOC origin and an L1 Status of Verified, will be visible to all Club users with Intl Amateur permissions
* These players will be returned as expected in both Quick Search and Advanced Search
* These players will automatically appear in the Club Reg List widget

title: New Outrighted MJ Roster Status Report
custom_preconds:
New report in EBIS that pulls all of the Major League players that have the new Outrighted status on EBIS

See: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3081404571/Player+Outright+-+Report+Details|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3081404571/Player+Outright+-+Report+Details|smart-link] 

Columns: 

* EBIS ID - Player ID
* MJC ID
* Player Name
* Pos
* Current Org - Abbreviation of Major ORG
* Date of outright
* Minor league roster status
* Minor league level assigned to - AAA, AA, A, etc.
* MJ Salary - MJ Base for current year
* MN Salary - P2 Salary

Filters:

* Org (can select multiple)

Sort:

* Alpha by last name

Group:

* By Org

title: Import Log - As a BOC Admin, I want the 40-Man Results file to highlight the rows with updated information
custom_preconds:
* Currently, the Results file for the Import 40-Man upload has one tab labeled â€œUpdates.â€� However, this file displays a list of information that has both changed since the previous upload and information that has not. Want the rows in the file with new information to be highlighted so that it is easier to see what has changed and what has stayed the same since the last upload.

AC:

* Go to the Import Log under the Agents & Agencies dashboard
* Select the Import 40-Man button and upload appropriate file
* Download the file that appears in the Results column
* There should be one tab in the file labeled â€œUpdatesâ€�
** Within this tab should include the columns: (see [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1720|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1720|smart-link] )
*** Team
*** PlayerID
*** Name
*** Field
*** From
*** To
*** Field
*** From
*** To
* For every row with new changes made in any aspect since the last upload, it will be highlighted yellow in order for the user to more easily see what has changed

title: As a developer I want transactions to call MN Payroll updates
custom_preconds: In addition to running the roster stored procedure on players each transaction should also call the MN Payroll stored procedure to update that players payroll information.

title: As a developer I want the MN Payroll to select from a table rather than a view
custom_preconds:
The MN payroll screen currently selects from the MN_PAYROLL_LEVEL_BY_PLAYER_VIEW.  Instead it should pull data from a table populated by nightly by the pro roster batch. 

Work for the pro roster batch will be done with [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1727|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1727|smart-link]

title: As a developer I want the pro roster batch to also store MN Payroll information
custom_preconds: The pro roster batch will call a second procedure for each player that runs the MN_PAYROLL_LEVEL_BY_PLAYER_VIEW on the player ID and stores the information for that player into a new table.

title: As a user I want the "Payroll start date" to default to a player's most recent outright transaction
custom_preconds: When creating an addendum C for a player who is currently outrighted to the minor leagues the payroll start date should default to the date of their most recent approved outright transaction.

title: As a user I want the "Payroll start date" to drive when an Addedum C starts applying to MN Payroll
custom_preconds: An addendum C signed midseason will start counting towards MN Payroll as of the payroll start date.

title: As a user I want to enter a "Payroll start date" on Addendum Cs
custom_preconds:
When creating a single addendum C for a player there will be a â€œPayroll start dateâ€� field which can be entered/changed by any user in any addendum c status.

If no date is entered upon state change the signing date of the add c should populate the payroll start date.

title: Import Log - As a BOC Admin, I want the addition of an â€œAgencies Createdâ€� column in the widget
custom_preconds:
AC:

* Go to the Import Log widget under the Agents & Agencies dashboard
* A new column in the widget will be labeled â€œAgencies Createdâ€� in order to represent the count of new agencies created within the Agent to Agencies Mapping process
* This will also be represented in the downloadable Results file under a new tab that is also labeled â€œAgencies Createdâ€�

title: Import Log - As a BOC Admin, I want the Import Agent Info Results file to show updates made only after going through the Agent to Agency Mapping process
custom_preconds:
* Currently, when the user uploads an Agent Info file, the Results file is provided immediately, only displaying information from the uploaded file and not showing any updates made after. 
* Want the Results file to be delayed until the user has made agent/agency updates in the Agent to Agency Mapping screen. Want the Results file to then show the updates that were just made from going through that Agent to Agency Mapping process.

AC:

* Go to the Import Log widget under the Agents & Agencies dashboard
* Select the Import Agent Info button and upload appropriate file
* AFTER completing the Agent to Agency Mapping process, THEN the Results file should appear with those updates included in the file
** If new agents were just created - These results will appear under the Agents Created tab
** If new agencies were just created - These results will appear under the Agencies Created tab (see [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1722|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1722|smart-link] )
* IF the uploaded file requires no further action OR user chooses to select â€œIgnore Remainingâ€� on the Confirmation modal, then Results file will appear immediately
** The new agents and agencies will then fall under the Agents Not Created and Unknown Agencies tabs respectively

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the 40-Man Results file to display updates of both Agents and Agencies
custom_preconds:
* Currently, the 40-Man Results file only displays changes in agencies. Would like to see additional columns in the sheet that display changes in agents as well.
* In the columns to the right of the initial â€œToâ€� column, add the following three columns in order to display the changes made regarding the primary agents
** Field
** From
** To

title: As a BOC Admin, I want an Error Message to show when uploading files with improper data in the 40-Man Import
custom_preconds: Regarding the 40-Man Import under the Import Log widget in the Agents & Agencies dashboard. Validate to ensure that the entered/typed data that is in the uploaded file matches the data in the system. Include an error message if the â€œpeopleIDâ€� typed in the uploaded file does not match player name in the system.

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Koren Boilerplate Included in MNCs if the Player Speaks Korean
custom_preconds:
AC:

* If a player has their language set to Korean on their profile, the Korean version of the mUPC will be printed along with the english
* This will work similar to existing functionality for Spanish language

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Addedum C salaries for players with a major contract to only pull the MJC salary until the end of the MJ season
custom_preconds:
Continuation of: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1616|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1616|smart-link] 

If a player has an approved MJC for the current year and is signing an MNC for the next year, the MJC will be ignored unless it covers the NEXT year.

examples:  

Player with a one year MJC and no MNC is sent to the minor leagues after the end of the MJ season, but before free agency.  This player doesnt get the MJC salary on their new MNC for next year, they are simply signing a non first year contract.

Player with a two year MJC and one year remaining and no MNC is sent to the minor leagues after the end of the MJ season, but before free agency.  This player DOES get the MJ salary on their new contract for next year and should use that salary.

title: As a EBIS User, I want a new Outrighted MJ Roster Status
custom_preconds:
Rules: 

[https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786509/List+of+MJ+Roster+Statuses|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786509/List+of+MJ+Roster+Statuses|smart-link] 

[https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3788774/6.+Major+Minor+Outright|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3788774/6.+Major+Minor+Outright|smart-link] 

AC:

* When a MJ/MN Outright Transaction is submitted, the player will have a pending roster status of "Outrighted"
* When a MJ/MN Outright Transaction is approved, the player will have a roster status of "Outrighted"
* This roster status will appear on profiles and widgets
* The roster status will be searchable
* The roster status will appear on reports
* This roster status will function similar to â€œOptionedâ€� and will be displayed along with the MN Roster Status

title: EBIS React - Style new React left nav, top nav, and main content pane so they look identical to the existing Angular UI
custom_preconds: Create an outer navigation layer for EBIS in React that mimicks the existing Angular navigation along the sides and top of the UI application.  6
